term.title: Mössbauer effect

item.text: Resonanceabsorption of γ-radiation by nuclei arranged in a crystal lattice in such a way that the recoil momentum is shared by many atoms.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1546 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
